net.javachallenge.api

Interface Field


  • public interface Field
    A class which represents the field which contains the veins and the squads. Note that this interface is immutable, thus, its object stores the information of just this turn and will not be updated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int countVeins(int plyaerId)
      Returns the number of veins which the specified player owns.
      java.util.ArrayList<Squad> getSquads()
      Returns the all squads as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<Squad> getSquads(int playerId)
      Returns the filtered squads by the specified id of the owner player as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.HashSet<TrianglePoint> getValidCoords()
      Returns the valid TrianglePoint instances as a copied mutable set.
      Vein getVein(TrianglePoint location)
      Returns the vein with the specified location.
      java.util.TreeMap<TrianglePoint,Vein> getVeinMap()
      Returns the Map instance of the locations (key) and the veins (value) as a copied mutable map.
      java.util.TreeMap<TrianglePoint,Vein> getVeinMap(int playerId)
      Returns the filtered Map instance of the locations (key) and the veins (value) by the specified id of the owner player as a copied mutable map.
      java.util.ArrayList<Vein> getVeins()
      Returns all veins as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<Vein> getVeins(int playerId)
      Returns all veins which the specified player owns as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<Vein> getVeinsOfOtherOwnersOrderedByDistance(Vein origination)
      Returns the veins of the other owners for the specified vein ordered by the distance in ascending order as a copied mutable list.
      java.util.ArrayList<Vein> getVeinsOfSameOwnerOrderedByDistance(Vein origination)
      Returns the veins of the same owner for the specified vein ordered by the distance in ascending order as a copied mutable list.
      int sumCurrentMaterialProductivity(int plyaerId, Material material)
      Sums and returns the productivity of the specified player and the specified material.
      int sumCurrentRobotProductivity(int plyaerId)
      Sums and returns the robot productivity of the specified player.
      int sumRobots(int plyaerId)
      Sums and returns the number of the robots of the specified player on the vertexes and the sides.
